abstract: A Google executive, Sheryl Sandberg, will join Facebook later this month as chief operating officer and will work closely with Mark Zuckerberg, Facebook’s co-founder.
snippet: A Google executive, Sheryl Sandberg, will join Facebook later this month as chief operating officer and will work closely with Mark Zuckerberg, Facebook’s co-founder.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Mark Zuckerberg of Facebook is not stepping aside for a chief executive as Larry Page and Sergey Brin did at Google or as Jerry Yang and David Filo did at Yahoo. He is following the Bill Gates model and holding the top post as he hires a Google executive, Sheryl Sandberg, as chief operating officer.

headline.main: Facebook Hires Google Executive as No. 2

byline.original: By Brad Stone and Miguel Helft

abstract: Announcements from Microsoft and Google highlight the jockeying among software companies to define how programs are written for cellphones. The winner may control what you do on your phone and how much you pay for it.
snippet: Announcements from Microsoft and Google highlight the jockeying among software companies to define how programs are written for cellphones. The winner may control what you do on your phone and how much you pay for it.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE: Edited to incorporate comments from readers reminding me about YouTube video on the iPhone. Also see note at end from Google

headline.main: The Battle Today for What You Can Do on Your Phone Tomorrow

abstract: Sheryl Sandberg, the new No. 2 executive at Facebook, is everything that its founder, Mark Zuckerberg, is not: experienced in operations, advertising and Washington.
snippet: Sheryl Sandberg, the new No. 2 executive at Facebook, is everything that its founder, Mark Zuckerberg, is not: experienced in operations, advertising and Washington.
lead_paragraph: Sheryl Sandberg may well be a perfect hire to be the No. 2 executive at Facebook. She’s very smart, well liked, seasoned, and comes with that Google aura.

headline.main: Facebook Finds a No. 2 Unlike Its No. 1
